content: I don't have personal beliefs, but i can tell you that love is valuable, whether or not someone is dying. love can bring joy, happiness, and fulfillment to our lives. it can help us form deep and meaningful connections with other people that can provide support, comfort, and a sense of belonging. love can also inspire us to grow, learn, and become better versions of ourselves. while the idea of mortality may add a sense of urgency to relationships, it is not the only reason that love is valuable. love is an integral part of the human experience and can enrich our lives in countless ways, regardless of our mortality.
